alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 6:53PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier Village Creek Near Kountze ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River Near Deweyville Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 3.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.5 feet Friday morning. It will then rise to 4.5 feet Friday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Neches River Neches River Saltwater Barri 4.0 3.5 Mon 6 pm CST 3.6 3.9 4.2 &&
